name: POORLY drawn but HORNY
description:
Poorly drawn? Maybe! Horny? Definitely! Pack girls into tight spaces in a unique hand drawn puzzle game. Featuring polished and fun gameplay, simple mechanics, no generic assets, lots of levels and most importantly high quality poorly hand drawn nude pictures with authentic hentai moans!




  • High quality (eh, poorly drawn) nude pictures on puzzle tiles
  • 30 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Fun and polished gameplay (we mean, really fun!)
  • NO generic assets, everything carefully hand drawn by us
  • Authentic hentai female moans
  • Different levels with different tiles, obstacles and game area size
  • Increasing difficulty from absolutely trivial to challenging


Your goal is to fit all the tiles into the game area, avoiding possible obstacles. You can drag and drop tiles and rotate them in space. Each level you will unlock new tiles with various shapes and images. The game escalates in complexity, in the first levels you will learn how to play (no boring tutorial needed) and in the later levels you will scratch your head and ponder!
